experience.title: Equity Research Analyst
experience.description: •Developed 10 + positive investment recommendations and determined valuations of stocks in multiple sectors using DCF model, public market comparable and available market opportunities over an investment horizon of 5 years. •Gather and analyze data from variety of sources including company documents and materials, SEC/ regulatory fillings (annual reports, 10-K's, 10-Q's), industry publications and online data services such as Bloomberg and Capital IQ.
experience.description_html: •Developed 10 + positive investment recommendations and determined valuations of stocks in multiple sectors using DCF model, public market comparable and available market opportunities over an investment horizon of 5 years. •Gather and analyze data from variety of sources including company documents and materials, SEC/ regulatory fillings (annual reports, 10-K's, 10-Q's), industry publications and online data services such as Bloomberg and Capital IQ. <!---->

experience.title: Equity Research Student Fund Analyst (Academic Experience)
experience.description: • The JIC student fund manages real securities with the hope of funding school endowments.                                                                       • We were to conduct market research to select a stock in the ‘Real Estate’ sector that would outperform the ETF in our sector.                                                       • I suggested using the “Narratives and Numbers Strategy” wherein we associated Narratives (story) of the company with the relevant numbers.• I build financial models for our Investment Pitch.APPROVED BY INVESTOR"S COMMITTEE AND GOT AN INVESTMENT OF $5000.
experience.description_html: • The JIC student fund manages real securities with the hope of funding school endowments. • We were to conduct market research to select a stock in the ‘Real Estate’ sector that would outperform the ETF in our sector. • I suggested using the “Narratives and Numbers Strategy” wherein we associated Narratives (story) of the company with the relevant numbers.• I build financial models for our Investment Pitch.APPROVED BY INVESTOR"S COMMITTEE AND GOT AN INVESTMENT OF $5000.

projects: [{"title":"CFA Research Challenge 2022","start_date":"Oct 2021","end_date":"Mar 2022","description":"- Prepared equity research report on \" Core Molding Technologies \".- The report included Investment recommendation, Business Description, Corporate Governance, Shareholder Base, Industry Overview, Competitive Analysis, Financial Analysis, Valuation, Risk Analysis, Key Ratios, M- Score Analysis, Z-Score Analysis, SWOT Analysis, Porters 5 forces, Sensitivity and Scenario Analysis, and Probability Vs Impact Matrix."},{"title":"Student Fund","start_date":"Aug 2021","end_date":"Dec 2021","description":"• The JIC student fund manages real securities with the hope of funding school endowments. • We were to conduct market research to select a stock in the ‘Real Estate’ sector that would outperform the ETF in our sector.• We considered business model, profitability, drivers of growth, future financial performance, and most importantly the “sustainable competitive advantage” of the company, followed by the company’s valuation."}]
